reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater looks cute and appreciate its high-quality knit, soft feel, and lightweight design, with one mentioning it's perfect for chilly Florida nights.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new holiday fav!
items.body: Absolutely darling. Perfect fit. Thicker than a tee shirt, but not a heavy sweater. Read more
items.author: ChrisL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good
items.body: Feels and looks good. I like that it is cotton. Read more
items.author: Brenda M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for disneyland
items.body: I got the XS which fit perfectly-for reference, I'm 5'0 and 96 lb, petite build. I wear a size 4/XS for tops. I love the sage color which is so pretty and goes with a lot. The Darth Vader is dark green and it's not overly loud and obnoxious. It fits nicely, not too snug with a little bit of room. The material is thin and lightweight, you can see thru it a little bit if you hold it up to the light. It's like a T shirt but with knit material. Layered with a sweatshirt, it should keep me warm when evenings at Disneyland dip into the lower temps. The length is long enough to cover most of my butt and it looks great with leggings. I appreciate that the sleeves aren't super long- I hate looking like Dopey the Dwarf. Hope that there will be more Disney or Star Wars designs coming out! Read more
items.author: PBR fan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Mickey Mouse Sweater
items.body: Great quality!!! Very soft too. Not to thick. Good value!! Read more
items.author: Joni McAlpin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Character Sweater
items.body: I love this lightweight sweater. It’s lightweight without feeling cheap. I wore this in the early spring several times. I a the type that is hot most of the time and I was comfortable in this. It’s light enough to wear under a jacket and it doesn’t make you appear bulky. Read more
items.author: Ketra Niebling

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, lightweight, where is the rest of her?
items.body: I have to say, I love all things Disney and we go to Disneyworld at least once a month, so when I have the opportunity to pick up some Disney apparel, I do. This sweater is really light weight which is very nice, especially for the Florida "winters" where there is occasionally a need to cover ones arms. I am giving this sweater only 4 stars for several reasons, none of which would stop me from getting it again. Fitst, I didn't realize until I pulled it out of the package that Minnie is missing her body. she looks like she is bursting through from my stomach. Now, I have a dozen children and even more grandchildren, so I am bound to get A LOT of opinions on A LOT of topics I don't ask for an opinion on. Perhaps if my son had not pointed this out, I would not have noticed. Secondly, you must MUST dry this sweater flat. Not because it will shrink or anything, but because this type of fabric will get pill-y and require a fabric shaver to bring it back to looking right. And third, the tag must come out before you put it on or you will go CRAZY because it has been sewn on with fishing line . On the positive side, this is a very affordable, authentic Disney sweater that I commonly wear when we go to the parks. It is a nice length and it is soft against my skin - now that I removed the tag. No one at WDW has stopped me an asked me where the rest of Minnie is so I am hoping it is just one of those strange things my very detail oriented son noticed. Read more
items.author: Stevie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas sweaters for my family
items.body: Bought this for my daughter in law and got the matching sweaters for my son and two year old grandson they looked great. They loved the quality colors as described soft not itchy and was warm and cozy. Read more
items.author: SedericksWife

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this sweater
items.body: I loved this sweatshirt. The quality was pretty good for the price. The size is on point too. I’m 5’1” 140lbs 34D and a large fit me well. I read the reviews and decided to “size up.” The fit is not super tight but also not super loose. Washability 10/10. I even put it in the dryer and it held up well. Warmth, I layered and it was pretty good. Material thickness is not super thick but also pretty decent. Hope this helps! Read more
items.author: Ashley P.

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mickey Fair Isle - Womens, Minnie Peace, Star Wars Grogu - Womens, Avengers Logo - Womens, Star Wars Vader. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
